text: Koly vony despaired minyayuchoho yoho rozumu, vony prysudyly razom. Yikhni starshi skazani, vy zdiysnyuyete shcho vash batʹko vzyav urochystu zastavu vid vas pered tym, yak BOH? Ranishe vy zahubyly Joseph. YA ne lyshayu tse mistse do moho batʹka daye meni dozvil, abo do BOHA sudytʹ dlya mene; Vin yavlyaye soboyu krashchoho Suddyu
